post:
Hello LES!

We know you've been waiting even longer for this, and we are proud to announce one more location in addition to our current offerings in Los Angeles, Dallas, New York, and Amsterdam: 

**Singapore, SG** is now online!  B) 

<img src="http://talk.lowendspirit.com/uploads/editor/vm/5scbisilnii0.jpg" width="550"/>
Thanks @vyas for this beautiful promotional image!

To celebrate, ~~we have extended the **LOWENDSPIRIT** promotion!~~ The first **10** people to use the code  **SINCITY50** will receive a 50% recurring discount on any monthly **SKVM plan** in any of our locations! Edit: Both promotions have ended!

<pre>
SKVM-512M
1x CPU 
512MB ECC RAM
15GB NVMe SSD RAID 10
0.5TB Transfer @ 1Gbps
1x IPv4 & IPv6 /64
</pre>
~~$3.00/mo~~ $1.50/mo | [Add to Cart](https://manage.maxkvm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1 "Add to Cart")

<pre>
SKVM-1G
1x CPU 
1GB ECC RAM
25GB NVMe SSD RAID 10
1TB Transfer @ 1Gbps
1x IPv4 & IPv6 /64
</pre>
~~$5.00/mo~~ $2.50/mo | [Add to Cart](https://manage.maxkvm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2 "Add to Cart")

<pre>
SKVM-2G

50GB NVMe SSD RAID 10
2TB Transfer @ 1Gbps
1x IPv4 & IPv6 /64
</pre>
~~$8.00/mo~~ $4.00/mo | [Add to Cart](https://manage.maxkvm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=3 "Add to Cart")

<pre>
SKVM-4G
2x CPU 
4GB ECC RAM
75GB NVMe SSD RAID 10
3TB Transfer @ 1Gbps
1x IPv4 & IPv6 /64
</pre>
~~$12.00/mo~~ $6.00/mo | [Add to Cart](https://manage.maxkvm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=4 "Add to Cart")

~~SAVE30~~, **EDU50**, and **ADD35** - are **still valid!**  ;) 
[https://www.maxkvm.com/promotions/](https://www.maxkvm.com/promotions/ "https://www.maxkvm.com/promotions/")

<img src="http://talk.lowendspirit.com/uploads/editor/45/vjg85iiprwc8.jpg" width="300"/>

Sure. But let us cherry pick your best from the yabs benchmark thread if you get better results!

**SKVM-2G:**

# ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## #

Singapore Network Looking Glass: [http://lg.sin.maxkvm.net/](http://lg.sin.maxkvm.net/ "http://lg.sin.maxkvm.net/")

Los Angeles Network Looking Glass: [http://lg.lax.maxkvm.net/](http://lg.lax.maxkvm.net/ "http://lg.lax.maxkvm.net/")

New York Network Looking Glass: [http://lg.nyc.maxkvm.net/](http://lg.nyc.maxkvm.net/ "http://lg.nyc.maxkvm.net/")

Amsterdam Network Looking Glass: [http://lg.ams.maxkvm.net/](http://lg.ams.maxkvm.net/ "http://lg.nyc.maxkvm.net/")

Our current users will tell you that we are incredibly responsive to support and monitor our systems very closely. Many of you have heard from us and/or had your system interrupted due to potential resource abuse. Please understand the resources in these plans are **fair share** and although you can always burst to use 100% of your allocated resources, using 100% of your CPU, Disk I/O, and/or Network 100% of the time means you need a dedicated server. These rules and procedures are in place to ensure uptime for all services - including yours.

Payment Options:
In addition to the new locations, we have also added a few new payment options for local and international customers, namely: **Stripe, Alipay, India Netbanking, Paytm, QIWI, SOFORT, Webmoney, Yandex.Money, Banamex, Bancomer, Bancontact, Boleto, DOKU, eNets, EPS, Globe GCash, iDeal, MyBank, Multibanco, Onecard, OXXO, PayU, and Przelewy24 (P24)**. PayPal and Bitcoin are still proudly accepted!

About Us:
_We are a small group of devs and sysadmins in San Diego, California with more than a decade of experience managing VOIP and other IT infrastructure for local small businesses in Southern California. We have upgraded our own backend infrastructure, incorporated, and now offer "low end" virtual servers to the same community we have been buying from since 2010._

If you have any questions or are looking for something custom, send a PM or post here.
